channel.title: R on XRLAB
channel.description: Recent content in R on XRLAB

item.title: Sections, Categories and Tags of XRLAB site
item.description: Sections are meant for the folders of your posts. Think of these as physical location of the posts. Sections are hierarchical which means you can create sub-sections. Categories are meant for broad grouping of your posts. Think of these as general topics or the table of contents for your site. Categories are hierarchical which means you can create sub-categories. Tags are meant to describe specific details of your posts.

item.title: Hugo-ivy Theme
item.description: Install History Home _index.Rmd or _index.md under ~/content to control the home page

item.title: Build web 如何配置R网站
item.description: 本地环境配置 R Rstudio Git git config –global user.name “bwtian” git config –global user.email “bwtian@qq.com” 网络环境配置 github org地址：https://github.com/tianlab public仓库：tianlab.github.io 域名环境配置 部署环境配置 #!/bin/sh #echo -e “\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub…\033[0m” # for windows, or mac error Go To Public folder cd public # Add changes to git. git pull git add . Commit changes. msg=“rebuilding site date” if [ $# -eq 1 ] then msg=“\(1" fi git commit -m "\)msg”
